defaultHabit4Notes: Either a Habit, a Daily, or a T' Do
defaultTodo1Text: Join Habitica (Ye should check me off!)
defaultTodoNotes: Ye can either complete this T' Do, edit it, or remove it.
defaultReward2Notes: Watch TV, play a game, eat a treat, it's up t' ye!
exerciseHabit: Show a leg, an' do 10 min cardio >> + 10 minutes cardio
workTodoProject: Work project >> Heave ho, an' complete work project
defaultHabitNotes: Er delete fr'm th' edit screen
defaultHabitText: Click 'ere t' edit this inta a bad habit ye'd like t' quit
creativityTodoNotes: Tap t' spes-fy th' name o' yer project
creativityDailyNotes: Tap t' spes-fy th' name o' yer curr'nt  project + set th' ske-jewel!
creativityDailyText: All hands hoay! Work on a crate-ive project
creativityHabit: Study a master o' th' trade >> + Bring a spring upon her cable an' practice a new crate-ive tek-nique
choresTodoNotes: Tap t' spes'fy th' bilge-filled area!

choresHabit: Heave down fer 10 minutes o' cleanin'
selfCareTodoNotes: Tap t' spes'fy what ye plan t' do!
selfCareTodoText: Splice the mainbrace and do somethin' fun
schoolTodoNotes: Tap t' name th' ess-eyenm'nt an' choose a due date!
schoolTodoText: Heave ho, an' finish an ess-eyenm'nt fer class
schoolDailyNotes: Tap t' choose yer homework ske-jewel!
schoolDailyText: Show a leg, an' finish yer homework
healthTodoText: Ske-jewel check-up >> Think o' a healthy change
exerciseDailyNotes: Tap t' choose yer ske-jewel n' spes'fy ex'rcises!
